title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5300.2 - Method of notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5300.2 - Method of notice

State Regulations

Pursuant to Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding

Laws Section 1307(2)(d), the Commission shall post on its website as notice to
all applicants, registrants, or licensees, the specifications of the
confidentiality of all information provided to the Commission by any applicant, registrant, or licensee, and the release thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5300.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
